posts.post_content:
Available for sale are the following cards [NOTE IF YOU WANT TO PURCHASE ANY CARD MAILING OF THAT CARD WILL BE DELAYED UNTIL THE WEEK OF SEPTEMBER 3RD.  MY RESPONSE TO ANY INQUIRY MAY BE DELAYED UNTIL THAT TIME AS WELL]:

PORTRAITS:

T206 - Herman Armbruster (SC 350/30) - SOLD
T206 - Roy Brashear (Piedmont 350/25) - $55
T206 - Al Bridwell (Piedmont 350-460/25) - SOLD
T206 - Bill Abstein (Piedmont 350/25) - $80

ACTION POSES:

T206 - Bobby Byrne (Piedmont 350/25) - SOLD

T206 - Bill Campbell (Piedmont 350/25) - SOLD
T206 - Birdie Cree (Piedmont 350/25) - $55
T206 - Fred Beck (SC 350/30) - $60

RARE BACKS:

T206 - Orval Overall (Hands at Face/Old Mill) - $70

Please add $5 for shipping.

If you want to purchase any card:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the card. This post will secure the card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.

4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
Do not reply to the above pictures.  I don't know what happened.  I have the identical post as a separate thread.
Sent you a PM on the Beck
